short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BitPet is a Web3 social game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bitpet is a social game based on web3 and twitter. Users develop pets by interacting with friends on Twitter. Users only need to install this plug-in and open twitter to start the game.
